title: The Stem of Jesse
html: 2 Nephi 21:1. "Stem of Jesse" Other translations refer to the "stump" of Jesse rather than stem. Interestingly, after the Lord has cut down a wicked forest, a new shoot develops from which will come the rod. Modern revelation gives us his identity: "Who is the Stem of Jesse? . . . Verily thus saith the Lord: It is Christ" (D&C 113:1–2).
